item.title: Course on reproducibility
item.author: nicolas.casajus@fondationbiodiversite.fr (FRB-CESAB)
item.description: Since 2019 the FRB-CESAB and the GDR EcoStat organize the training course Data Toolbox for Reproducible Research in Computational Ecology. The objective of this five-day course, in French, is to train young researchers in reproducibility, software development and version management tools (e.g. R, git, markdown, tidyverse, docker), applied to biodiversity research.
